        {
            "id": "0a0d143e-59bb-4748-bdae-a1452c4c1521",
            "key": "a-fit-indiana-economic-development-commission",
            "name": "aFit - Indiana Economic Development Commission",
            "notes": "This Subcontract Statement of Work #100 (the “SOW”) is dated as of September 7, 2023 (the “SOW Effective Date”) and is entered into by and between aFit Staffing, Inc. (“aFit”) and Cloud SynApps, Inc. (“Company” or “Subcontractor”) (collectively, the “Parties”). This SOW is made and pursuant to the Subcontract Agreement between the Parties dated as of September 7, 2023 (the “Agreement”) and is hereby made a part of and incorporated into the Agreement. The terms and conditions of the Agreement shall govern this SOW, and to the extent that any provision of this SOW contradicts or is inconsistent with the Agreement, such terms of the Agreement shall control unless the Agreement expressly allows for this SOW to control. The purpose of this SOW is to more fully describe the Services and obligations to be performed under the Agreement. Unless otherwise defined herein, capitalized words that appear in this SOW are defined in the Agreement.\nDescription of Services and Milestones\nStart Date: September 11, 2023\nProjected End Date: September 29, 2023; with option to extend\nClient / Project Name: \naFit Staffing – Indiana Economic Development Commission (“Client”), Budget Management on PSF\nProject Background:\nThe Indiana Economic Development Corporation (IEDC) currently is using spreadsheets and manual processes to track grant management budgets.  They entered an agreement with aFit Staffing, Inc. to implement the solution on Salesforce Public Sector Foundation. A portion of the project has been completed, and Cloud SynApps will complete the assigned user stories outlined by aFit Staffing.\nProject Scope:\n•\tAssess the environment and development completed to determine if any remediation is needed\n•\tBuild out forms/reports/dashboards in the user stories\n•\tSince this is a Time and Materials project, others areas may be addressed as needed\n\nProject Staffing:\nThe Supplier proposes a Salesforce Architect, Ashish Master, to implement the stated scope of work.\n",

            "start": "2023-09-11",
            "end": "2023-09-29",
